thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: P Iddon & N Johnson
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by P Iddon & N Johnson

author: P Iddon & N Johnson
title: P Iddon & N Johnson
text:
We have had Kate as our property manager for approx 15 years. We dread the day she decides to retire because she has been an excellent manager for all that time.
Kate is always responsive to us as landlords as well as to the tenants. She offers sound advice when asked and is efficient and thorough when required to act of our behalf in organising repairs, new tenants or any other function as our manager.
We highly recommend Kate to anyone looking for reliable professional property management.
